existing_features.title: Create a responsive, multi-page frontend scaffold for a youth organization app with a top navigation and the following pages: Home, About, Programs, Events, Contact.
Apply a coherent visual theme appropriate for a youth organization (colors, typography, spacing, components) and use it consistently across all pages.
Add a Home page hero section that uses a generated hero image and includes an English headline and short description suitable for a youth organization.
Add generated static image assets to the project under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them in the UI where appropriate (e.g., hero and logo).

imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Friendly youth-organization logo mark, flat vector style (youth-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Warm, energetic hero banner illustration/photo-collage style with diverse youths, no text (youth-hero.dim_1600x900.png)
- Small set of 3 simple flat icons representing activities/learning/community (youth-icons.dim_768x256.png)

generatedImages.description: Friendly youth-organization logo mark, flat vector style
Warm, energetic hero banner illustration/photo-collage style with diverse youths, no text
Small set of 3 simple flat icons representing activities/learning/community

projectName: Create initial youth organization app (landing + basic pages)
